sequential inference models.from sentence: While some previous top - performing models use rather complicated network architectures to achieve the state - of - the - art results , we demonstrate in this paper that enhancing sequential inference models based on chain models can outperform all previous results , suggesting that the potentials of such sequential inference approaches have not been fully exploited yet .

explicitly encoding.from sentence: We show that by explicitly encoding parsing information with recursive networks in both local inference modeling and inference composition and by incorporating it into our framework , we achieve additional improvement , increasing the performance to a new state of the art with an 88.6 % accuracy .
